author: Staff Reporter
text:
A software engineer was killed after he was knocked off his motorcycle by an MTC bus on Kodambakkam flyover on Friday.

Yuvraj (27), was on his way to his office at Nungambakkam on a two-wheeler, when he tried to overtake another two-wheeler on the flyover. But a Metropolitan Transport Corporation (MTC) bus on route no. 37G (Ayyappanthangal to Mint) that was heading in the opposite direction knocked him down. The engineer fell off his motorcycle, sustaining injuries on his head.

Yuvraj, police said, had not been wearing his helmets.

He was immediately rushed to the Government Royapettah Hospital for treatment where he was pronounced dead on arrival.

Yuvraj was living at a bachelor’s accommodation in Saidapet.

The Kodambakkam Traffic Investigation arrested Chakravarty, the driver of the bus.
title: Techie killed in accident
